title: Border
body: I was Gold 1 when the season ended but i end up getting the silver border???? what do i do

replies.body:
Hiya! 

When playing any ranked game mode, your respective border from last season in that particular queue will show. In normal games, as well as custom games, your best achieved border will show.

Looks like you were Silver in Team 5v5s, so when playing ranked  Team 5v5s, you'll see a silver border. In all other instances, you should see a Gold border. 

Rewards are beginning to roll out now and your updated border for the 2015 season will be added to your account by the end of the day on November 18th.

If this isn't the case and you still believe you're seeing the wrong border, please [submit](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) a ticket and we can take a better look at your account.
So, if I'm silver 2 in solo que, but gold 3 in ranked 3v3, ill only see a gold boarder in 3v3 loading screen's?
WELL FUCK I GOTTA TRY TO GET GOLD
